segments.text: I didn't really like it all that much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think the problem was ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , they are pretty new . I just didn't feel that they were ready to open yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How did you feel about the food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The food wasn't all that exciting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think that the service was good , either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the service certainly didn't add to the experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to return to this restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we could try it again in a few months when things have settled down .
segments.speaker: S2
